name: Hollow Steps
description: You are a customer of a virtual world company Dartom Inc. You are one of the many people who wants to test themselves in one of the many worlds created by the company. On your test, a ghost in the system will change your experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows Vista Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
